title: Inside theme+MathJax
content:
Using MathJax plugin to deal with a problem that original Inside theme can’t render the mathmatical formula written by latex code normally.

The original Inside theme can’t render the mathmatical formula written by latex code normally. So I want to add MathJax plugin to render it.

Someone has developed a plugin named “hexo-filter-mathjax-ssr”. I will add it to my website.

Installation

If your internet speed was poor, maybe you can refer to “Migration of Hexo+Github Pages” in the root.

Config

hexo/_config.yml

configure the mathjax.

done!

Reference

https://blog.oniuo.com/post/math-jax-ssr-example#cauchys-integral-formula
